hackathon.title: GAIA
hackathon.subtitle: AI-Driven Emergent Narrative Game
hackathon.description: Led development of a fully AI-driven emergent narrative game using OpenAI API to procedurally generate dynamic storylines and adaptive gameplay. Employed DALL-E and Minimax APIs for multithreaded AI video rendering.
features: Adaptive gameplay that responds to player choices

hackathon.title: Sparky
hackathon.subtitle: Robot Productivity Companion
hackathon.description: Built firmware and software for a robot productivity companion that tracks mobile phone usage using computer vision with OpenCV. Used virtualized serial communication and webcam feeds to emulate Arduino camera inputs.
features: Phone usage tracking via computer vision

hackathon.title: WikiChess
hackathon.subtitle: Wikipedia Racing Chess Game
hackathon.description: Led development of a web-based game inspired by Wikiracer. Used BeautifulSoup4 for web scraping and spaCy for natural language processing and semantic comparison.
features: Natural language processing for semantic comparison
Unique gameplay combining chess + wiki racing

personal.title: devray.ca
personal.subtitle: Personal Portfolio Website
personal.description: This portfolio website! Built with React and Vite, featuring a terminal-inspired design with an interactive CLI, file system navigation, and smooth animations.
